sentences.en: Each of the bodily organs has its own specific ( al ) function.
sentences.cn: 人体每个器官都有它独特的功能.

sentences.en: Exercise of the mental faculties is as important as bodily excercise.
sentences.cn: 智能的锻炼同身体的运动同样重要.

sentences.en: He likes to be sure of his bodily comforts.
He pleaded guilty to causing actual bodily harm.
sentences.cn: 他承认确实犯有人身伤害罪。

sentences.en: He was charged with maliciously inflicting grievous bodily harm.
sentences.cn: 他被控蓄意严重伤害他人身体.

sentences.en: I was hurled bodily to the deck.
sentences.cn: 我整个人都被摔到了甲板上。

sentences.en: Parts of your article have been lifted bodily from a well - known magazine.
sentences.cn: 你的文章中有几部分是从一本有名的杂志中整个抄袭来的.

sentences.en: Scientists provided the key to understanding the genetic code that determines every bodily feature.
sentences.cn: 科学家们找到了破解决定各种身体特征的遗传密码的密钥。

sentences.en: Some drugs can cause the inhibition of normal bodily activity.
sentences.cn: 有些药剂会对正常的身体功能产生抑制作用.

sentences.en: The audience rose bodily to cheer the hero.
sentences.cn: 听众全体起立向那位英雄欢呼致意.

sentences.en: The column was transferred bodily to a new site by the bank of the river.
sentences.cn: 那根圆柱被整体迁到河堤边的一个新址。

sentences.en: The man we thought dead walked bodily into the room.
sentences.cn: 我们以为死了的那个人活生生地走进了房间.

sentences.en: There's more to eating than just bodily needs.
sentences.cn: 饮食不仅仅是出于身体的需要。

sentences.en: They were both found guilty of causing grievous bodily harm.
sentences.cn: 他们两人都被判造成他人严重人身伤害的罪名成立。

sentences.en: This can lead to bodily weakness and muscle wastage.
sentences.cn: 这样可能会导致身体虚弱和肌肉萎缩。

words.tran_cn: 身体；主体；大量；团体；主要部分
赋…以形体；体现（body的过去分词）
整体地；亲自地；以肉体形式

trans.tran_en: by moving a large object in one piece
